LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Plasteel.label: Embed plastic shell
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Plasteel.description: Plasteel is embedded in the shell of the Arachne insect. When the carapace grows further, this plasteel is wrapped in the carapace and becomes a stronger exoskeleton, strengthening the insect's defense power.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Shell_Thorn.label: embed carapace spines
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Shell_Thorn.descript: Two rows of spinous stingers are implanted into the shell of the Arachne bug. These are semi-autonomous organs that automatically fire barbs at nearby enemies. This mutation also thickens the shell, improving its defenses.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Reactive_Shell.label: Embed a reactive shell
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Reactive_Shell.descr: A special reactive shell is embedded in the shell of the Arachne insect.These are temporarily activated and protect the body by ejecting the shell in the event of an attack.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Carapace_Shell.label: embed carapaceous proliferation
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Carapace_Shell.descr: Uses shell material to increase the thickness of the Arachne insect's shell, giving it additional defensive power.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Strengthening_Tendon: Reinforced tendons are implanted into the legs of Arachne Bugs, giving them the ability to move at higher speeds and jump short distances.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Slide_Patagium.label: Embed a gliding membrane
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Slide_Patagium.descr: Gliding membranes are embedded in the legs of Arachne insects, greatly increasing their movement speed on the fungal bed.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Huge_Stomach.label: Implant additional gastric sac.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Huge_Stomach.descrip: It induces directed mutations in the Arachnid bugs, allowing them to expand their nutrient-storing gastric sacs to store more food.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Internal_Circulation: It induces a directed mutation in the arachne worms, allowing their lungs to self-circulate and withstand near-vacuum attacks.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Cycle_Suppression.de: It induces directed mutations in the Arachne insects, allowing them to survive for a long time without being limited by lifespan. However, when life cycle inhibitors are injected, self-healing ability is lost.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Acidling_Pouch.label: Embed the explosive seed hatching sac
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Acidling_Pouch.descr: It induces a directed mutation in the Arachne insects and creates a sac that stores 3 explosive species that are scheduled to hatch in advance.When released, they attack the enemy with a suicide attack.
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Tumor_Pouch.label: Implant the mycocele hatching sac
LanguageData.ARA_Surgery_Install_Tumor_Pouch.descript: It induces directed mutation in Arachne insects and stores one withering fungus in the hatching sac.When released, it transforms the surrounding ground into a fungal bed topography.
LanguageData.ARA_CureAcid.label: remove neurotoxins
LanguageData.ARA_CureAcid.description: Arachnid insects can use healing elements to remove the effects of the neurotoxins they release and return their prey to a normal state.
LanguageData.ARA_CureAcid.successfullyRemovedHediffMe: {0} successfully removed the Arachne neurotoxin from {1}'s body.
LanguageData.ARA_CureBloodRot.label: Eliminate pseudonematode infections
LanguageData.ARA_CureBloodRot.description: The surgery to eliminate Arachne pseudonematodes within a patient's body through targeted therapy using multiple drugs is extremely complex and can only be performed using cutting-edge medicines provided by Glitterworld.
LanguageData.ARA_CureBloodRot.successfullyRemovedHedi: {0} successfully removed the pseudonematode infection from {1}'s body.
